name: Whole Baked Fish, Moroccan-Style
recipeIngredient: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1 4-pound whole fish such as striped bass, sea bass, red snapper, head and tail intact

recipeInstructions.text: Reserving a few sprigs of coriander for garnishing, combine all the ingredients except the fish in an electric blender and mix until smooth. With a sharp knife, make three slashes in the skin. Smear the mixture in the fish cavity and over the skin. Leave to marinate at room temperature for about 2 hours.
Broil the fish for about 10 minutes on each side, depending on the thickness of the fish, or until cooked. Arrange on a serving platter, garnish with coriander and lemon slices.
